title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 1050.6 - Personnel of funded substance abuse programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 1050.6 - Personnel of funded substance abuse programs

State Regulations

No persons receiving compensation as an employee from a
funded substance abuse program may serve on the governing body of that
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
1050.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
